comment:
* A driver for SQLiteCursors that is used to create them and gets notified
 * by the cursors it creates on significant events in their lifetimes.

methods.name: Cursor query(CursorFactory factory, String[] bindArgs)
methods.comment:
* Executes the query returning a Cursor over the result set.
     * 
     * @param factory The CursorFactory to use when creating the Cursors, or
     *         null if standard SQLiteCursors should be returned.
     * @return a Cursor over the result set

methods.name: void cursorDeactivated()
methods.comment: * Called by a SQLiteCursor when it is released.

methods.name: void cursorRequeried(Cursor cursor)
methods.comment: * Called by a SQLiteCursor when it is requeried.

methods.name: void cursorClosed()
methods.comment: * Called by a SQLiteCursor when it it closed to destroy this object as well.

methods.name: public void setBindArguments(String[] bindArgs)
methods.comment:
* Set new bind arguments. These will take effect in cursorRequeried().
     * @param bindArgs the new arguments
